Package pe2

Class Hospital

java.lang.Object
pe2.Hospital
Direct Known Subclasses:
Person
public class Hospital extends Object
This class basically defines a hospital composed of a team of Physicians,Administrators and Volunteer workers, which admits and treats patients on a first-come-first-come basis.
Author:
Ursanne Kengne

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected Administrator
    administrator
    This instance variable represents an administrator hired by the hospital.
    protected List<PhysicianAdministrator>
    administratorList
    This list represents the number of physicianAdministrators hired by the hospital and assigned to the director of the hospital.The number of physicianAdministrators in this list should not exceed 3.
    protected Hospital
    hospDirector
    This instance variable represents the director of the hospital.
    protected List<Physician>
    hospitalPhysicianList
    This list represents the number of physicians currently hired by the hospital and working in the hospital.The number of patients in this list should not exceed 70.
    protected List<Patient>
    patientHospitalList
    This list represents the number of patients currently admitted and under treatment in the hospital.The number of this list should not exceed 500.
    protected List<Patient>
    physicianPatientList
    This list represents the number of patients assigned to a particular physician.The number of patients in this list should not exceed 8.
    protected List<Physician>
    specialtyPhysicianList
    This list represents the number of physicians which are assigned to a physicianAdministrator of the same specialty.The number of physicians in this list should not exceed 25.
    protected List<Volunteer>
    volunteerHospitalList
    This list represents the number of volunteers hired by the hospital and currently working in the hospital.The number of volunteers in this list should not exceed 150.
    protected List<Volunteer>
    volunteerPhysicianList
    This list represents the number of volunteers assigned to particular physician.The number of volunteers in this list should not exceed 5.

  • Field Details

    • patientHospitalList

      protected List<Patient> patientHospitalList
      This list represents the number of patients currently admitted and under treatment in the hospital.The number of this list should not exceed 500.

    • hospitalPhysicianList

      protected List<Physician> hospitalPhysicianList
      This list represents the number of physicians currently hired by the hospital and working in the hospital.The number of patients in this list should not exceed 70.

    • specialtyPhysicianList

      protected List<Physician> specialtyPhysicianList
      This list represents the number of physicians which are assigned to a physicianAdministrator of the same specialty.The number of physicians in this list should not exceed 25.

    • physicianPatientList

      protected List<Patient> physicianPatientList
      This list represents the number of patients assigned to a particular physician.The number of patients in this list should not exceed 8.

    • volunteerHospitalList

      protected List<Volunteer> volunteerHospitalList
      This list represents the number of volunteers hired by the hospital and currently working in the hospital.The number of volunteers in this list should not exceed 150.

    • volunteerPhysicianList

      protected List<Volunteer> volunteerPhysicianList
      This list represents the number of volunteers assigned to particular physician.The number of volunteers in this list should not exceed 5.

    • administratorList

      protected List<PhysicianAdministrator> administratorList
      This list represents the number of physicianAdministrators hired by the hospital and assigned to the director of the hospital.The number of physicianAdministrators in this list should not exceed 3.

    • administrator

      protected Administrator administrator
      This instance variable represents an administrator hired by the hospital.

    • hospDirector

      protected Hospital hospDirector
      This instance variable represents the director of the hospital.

      This method assigns the parameter hospDirector to the instance variable hospDirector.
      Parameters:
      hospDirector - is assigned to the instance variable hospDirector.

    • addAdministrator

      public boolean addAdministrator​(PhysicianAdministrator admin)
      This method adds a physicianAdministrator to the hospital administrator record(List). 
       Precondition: The hospital's administratorList size is strictly less than 3.
      Parameters:
      admin - The physicianAdministrator to be added to the hospital's administratorList provided precondition is satisfied
      Returns:
      returns true if admin has been added successfully,otherwise returns false .

    • getAdministrator

      public Administrator getAdministrator()
      This method returns instance variable administrator of this hospital.
      Returns:
      returns instance variable administrator of this hospital.

    • setAdministrator

      public void setAdministrator​(Administrator administrator)
      This method sets the administrator instance variable of this administrator.
      Parameters:
      administrator - is assigned to administrator instance variable of this hospital.

    • admitPatient

      public boolean admitPatient​(Patient newPatient) throws NoSpaceException
      Throws:
      NoSpaceException

    • dischargePatient

      public boolean dischargePatient​(Patient patient)
      This method discharges a patient once the patient's treatment is completed.
      Parameters:
      patient - is the patient to be discharged.
      Returns:
      returns true if the patient's records if successfully removed from hospitalPatientList and from the physicianPatientList of the physician, to which the patient was assigned. Returns false,otherwise.

    • hireVolunteer

      public boolean hireVolunteer​(Volunteer newVolunteer)
      This method hires a newVolunteer in the hospital on certain conditions. 
      Precondition: The number of volunteers in volunteerHospitalList is not greater than or equal to 150.
       There is no volunteer record of the volunteer to be hired in volunteerHospitalList.
       There is at least one physician in hospitalPhysicianList whose volunteerPhysicianList's size is strictly less than 5.
      Parameters:
      newVolunteer - is the volunteer to be hired by the hospital.
      Returns:
      returns true if all of the above conditions are met,returns false otherwise.

    • resignVolunteer

      public boolean resignVolunteer​(Volunteer volunteer) throws NoVolunteersException
      This method resigns a volunteer from the hospital 
      Precondition: The number of volunteers in volunteerHospitalList is strictly greater than 1.
      Parameters:
      volunteer - is the resigning volunteer.
      Returns:
      returns true if the precondition holds ,returns false otherwise.
      Throws:
      NoVolunteersException - NoVolunteersException is thrown if volunteerHospitalList's size is less than or equal to 1.

    • extractAllPatientDetails

      public List<Patient> extractAllPatientDetails()
      This method returns a list of all patients in patientHospitallist in a sorted manner.
      Returns:
      returns a list of all patients in patientHospitallist in a sorted manner.

    • extractAllPhysicianDetails

      public List<Physician> extractAllPhysicianDetails()
      This method returns a list of all physicians in hospitalPhysicianList in a strong>sorted manner.
      Returns:
      returns a list of all physicians in hospitalPhysicianList in a strong>sorted manner.

    • extractAllVolunteerDetails

      public List<Volunteer> extractAllVolunteerDetails()
      This method returns a list of all volunteers in volunteerHospitalList.
      Returns:
      returns a list of all volunteers in volunteerHospitalList.

    • hirePhysician

      public boolean hirePhysician​(Physician newPhysician)
      This method hires a new physician in the hospital. 
      Precondition: The number of physicians in hospitalPhysicianList is strictly less than 70.
      hospitalPhysicianList does not contain a physician record of the physician to be hired.
      Parameters:
      newPhysician - is the physician to be hired by the hospital
      Returns:
      returns true if the above preconditions are satisfied,otherwise returns false.

    • resignPhysician

      public boolean resignPhysician​(Physician physician) throws NoSpecialtyException
      This method resigns a physician from the hospital. 
      Precondition: There is at least one physician in hospitalPhysicianList with the same specialty as the resigning physician.
       There are sufficient number of physicians to handle the volunteers and patients of the resigning physicians in the hospital.
      Parameters:
      physician - is the resigning physician
      Returns:
      returns true if all of the above preconditions are met,otherwise returns false.
      Throws:
      NoSpecialtyException - NoSpecialtyException is thrown if there is no physician in the hospital with the same specialty.

    • extractPhysicianAdmins

      public List<PhysicianAdministrator> extractPhysicianAdmins()
      This method returns a list of PhysicianAdministrators of the hospital.
      Returns:
      returns a list of PhysicianAdministrators of the hospital.
